uvars.v: Flag showing if a player is a potential farmer
Flag qui dit si on a affronter le boss sangsue
Shows whether the new player welcome tutorial is active for a given player.
Progression in the tutorial, contains the ID of the current objective?
Flag which shows if a player is a coder or not?
Number of Elite days the player has REMAINING?
If the player has used an Elite day today
Cosmetic surgery at the clinic. This value represents what the PLAYER HAS REMAINING.
Conversion from Gold to Treasury Notes. This value represents what the CAN STILL BE CONVERTED by the player.
Number of combats against the 1st Colossus from Big All Hot
Number of combats against the 2nd Colossus (Behemount) at the Steppes
number of combats against the 3rd Colossus (Serpether) on Caushemesh
You have succeeded in collecting the 100 devourer grains to conclude your deal with Jasper K.
Flag to show that the player has received a reminder email for caushemesh
Flag to show that the user came back to the site following the mail about caushemesh
Flag pour spécifier que ce joueur a déjà vidé trop de grilles de gather (hors event) aujourd'hui
Flag pour spécifier que ce joueur a déjà accéder à l'étape journalière de l'event xmasevent
Variable which shows whether a player is ready and willing to participate in a BETA.
Variable which shows if the player has unlocked the ability to decipher the Arborian language.
This player has completed Klutz's Airpur mission.
Counts the number of times the player talks to the second-hand dealer at the market. The more they talk to him, the better they know how not to get ripped off.
The number of eggs the player has bought from Madame Urma.
The number of hits this object inflicted on the shovel, which will make it break only after a certain time.
Number of digging actions that have been carried out.
Progression tracker for the introductory tutorial.

Progression tracker when smartBegin is active. As the counter progresses, the less we help the player. This helps the player get to grips with the game. (remember, over 60% of lost players had no Irmas left)
If the player has used a DinoFight code or not.
Number of Quetzu Dinoz the player has bought. As this Dinoz is rare, there is a limit so that they don't start appearing everywhere.
Player's Title. This must come from the selection made available from trophies earned.
Number of Irma's Potions consumed
Number of times the Dinoz has died.
Number of days of activity on the site (and inactivity since registration).
Number of moves made.
Number of hunts.
Number of fishing trips.
Number of times the player has been out gathering ingredients.
Number of times this player has re-energised their Dinoz.
Number of searches carried out by the player
Number of HP restored by objects and by resting.
Number of level-ups.
Number of wood level-ups.
Number of fire level-ups.
Number of lightning level-ups.
Number of water level-ups.
Number of air level-ups.
Nombre de combats réalisés.
Nombre de monstres tués.
Nombre de Dinoz tués.
Nobmre de pelles que le joueurs à cassé.
Nombre de ventes conclues au marché.
Nombre d'achats réalisés en boutique.
Nombre d'achats réalisés au marché.
Nombre de fois que le joueur à défendu le château en Guerre des clans
Nombre de fois que le joueur à attaqué le château ennemi en Guerre des clans
Nombre de fois que le joueur à chercher à changer de clan durant la GDM
Nombre de déplacements réalisés durant les batailles du championnat des clans.
Nombre de combats réalisés durant les batailles du championnat des clans.
Nombre de clans dans lequel le joueur a été
Nombre de clans que le joueur a créés.
Nombre de titres de beautés remportés par les Dinoz du joueur.
Number of clan-related actions carried out by the player
